00011     PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() :
00012         G4VUserPrimaryGeneratorAction(), 
00013         random_(new TRandom) {

00020     void PrimaryGeneratorAction::setPrimaryGenerator(G4VPrimaryGenerator* aGenerator) {
00021        
00022         // The other generators don't play nice with G4ParticleGun, so
00023         // if there is already a generator and it's the G4ParticleGun just clear the vector 
00024         bool clearGeneratorVector = false;
00025         unsigned int ngens = generator_.size();
00026         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ngens; ++i){
00027             if (dynamic_cast<G4ParticleGun*>(generator_[i]) !=  NULL) {
00028                 clearGeneratorVector = true;
00029             }
00030         }
00031         if (clearGeneratorVector) generator_.clear();
00032 
00033         generator_.push_back(aGenerator);
00034 
00035         if ((dynamic_cast<MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator*>(aGenerator)) != NULL){
00036             indexMpg_ = ((int) generator_.size()) - 1;
00037         }
00038         
00039     }
00040 
00041     void PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries(G4Event* event) {
00042         
00043         unsigned int ngens = generator_.size();
00044         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ngens; ++i) {
00045             generator_[i]->GeneratePrimaryVertex(event);
00046 
00047             // automatically setting genStatus to 1 for particle gun primaries
00048             if (dynamic_cast<G4ParticleGun*>(generator_[i]) !=  NULL) {
00049 
00050                 int nPV = event->GetNumberOfPrimaryVertex();
00051                 for (int iPV = 0; iPV < nPV; ++iPV) {
00052                     G4PrimaryVertex* curPV = event->GetPrimaryVertex(iPV);
00053                     int nPar = curPV->GetNumberOfParticle();
00054                     for (int iPar = 0; iPar < nPar; ++iPar) {
00055                         UserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = new UserPrimaryParticleInformation();
00056                         primaryInfo->setHepEvtStatus(1);
00057                         curPV->GetPrimary(iPar)->SetUserInformation(primaryInfo);
00058                     }
00059                 }
00060             }
00061         }
00062             
00063         // Activate the plugin manager hook.        
00064         if (event->GetNumberOfPrimaryVertex() > 0) {
00065             if (useBeamspot_) smearingBeamspot(event);
00066             pluginManager_->generatePrimary(event);
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00070     void PrimaryGeneratorAction::smearingBeamspot(G4Event* event) {
00071         
00072         double IPWidthX = beamspotXSize_;
00073         double IPWidthY = beamspotYSize_;
00074 
00075         int nPV = event->GetNumberOfPrimaryVertex();
00076         for (int iPV = 0; iPV < nPV; ++iPV) {
00077             G4PrimaryVertex* curPV = event->GetPrimaryVertex(iPV);
00078             double x0_i = curPV->GetX0();
00079             double y0_i = curPV->GetY0();
00080             double z0_i = curPV->GetZ0();
00081             double x0_f = random_->Uniform( x0_i - IPWidthX, x0_i + IPWidthX );
00082             double y0_f = random_->Uniform( y0_i - IPWidthY, y0_i + IPWidthY );
00083             curPV->SetPosition( x0_f, y0_f, z0_i );
00084         }        
00085 
00086     }
00087 }
